kentauros.construct package¶

Submodules¶

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec module¶

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec contains helper functions for building rpm source packages

exception kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.RPMSpecError(value)[source]¶

Bases: Exception

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.RPMSpecError: exception for rpm spec errors

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.bump_release()[source]¶

returns release string bumped by 1 (hopefully intelligently)

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.if_release()[source]¶

function returns release string if “Release: ” is found on spec file line

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.if_version()[source]¶

function returns version string if “Version: ” is found on spec file line

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_bump()[source]¶

function bumps the spec file for new release (via rpmdev-bumpspec)

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_preamble_bzr(source)[source]¶

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_preamble_bzr(): returns rpm spec %defines lines formatted nicely for bzr sources

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_preamble_git(source)[source]¶

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_preamble_git(): returns rpm spec %defines lines formatted nicely for git sources

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_preamble_url(source)[source]¶

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_preamble_url(): returns rpm spec %defines lines formatted nicely for url sources

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_release_read(file_obj)[source]¶

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_release_read(): returns release string found on rpm spec “Release:” tagline

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_version_bzr(source)[source]¶

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_version_bzr(): returns rpm spec “Version:” tagline formatted nicely for bzr sources

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_version_git(source)[source]¶

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_version_git(): returns rpm spec “Version:” tagline formatted nicely for git sources

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_version_read(file_obj)[source]¶

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_version_read(): returns version string found on rpm spec “Version:” tagline

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_version_url(source)[source]¶

kentauros.construct.rpm_spec.spec_version_url(): returns rpm spec “Version:” tagline formatted nicely for url sources

Module contents¶

kentauros.construct module contains classes, methods and functions for building source packages
